definition: to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act
to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: What did he think was going on?
sentences.chinese: 他對時局演變的看法爲何？

sentences.english: "We cannot allow a crisis in our financial system to become a crisis in confidence," he said.
sentences.chinese: 我們不能允許金融體系中的危機演變成信心危機。

sentences.english: It became a major shopping day in 2009.
sentences.chinese: 2009年，該節日演變成重要的網購節。

sentences.english: The whole idea evolved from a casual remark.
sentences.chinese: 整個想法是由一句脫口而出的話演變而來的。

sentences.english: Some incidents did end in violence, of course.
sentences.chinese: 當然有些事件最終演變成了惡鬥。

sentences.english: History of humankind in the period before recorded history.
There was an evolution process in Zhou Gucheng s ancient history staging concept.
sentences.chinese: 周谷城的古史分期觀有其演變過程。

sentences.english: Influence of the terrestrial heat flow on the evolution of the surface ecosystem and environment.
sentences.chinese: 試論大地熱流對地表環境與生態演變的影響。

sentences.english: Regional institutions have already played a significant part in Asia’s evolution.
sentences.chinese: 地區性機構在亞洲的演變中已經發揮了重要作用。

sentences.english: For your organization to be successful, these two worlds must evolve together.
sentences.chinese: 您的組織要獲得成功，這兩個方面必須共同演變。

sentences.english: The reservoir operation is an important influence on the evolution of ice regime.
sentences.chinese: 水庫的運用對凌情的演變有重要影響。

sentences.english: The chapter 3 demonstrates the mode transformation course of TCL white household electrical appliance distributing channel.
sentences.chinese: 第3章是分析TCL白家電渠道分銷模式的演變過程。

sentences.english: He concluded that these expressions evolved through natural selection.
sentences.chinese: 他得出結論，這此表達方式經自然選擇演變而來。

sentences.english: The aim was to reveal the evolutions of soil environment quality around Huashan scenic spots and its pollution characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 揭示花山景區附近土壤環境質量演變狀況及污染特點。

sentences.english: Microstructure evolution during partial remelting and isothermal holding was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了重熔過程中的枝晶演變規律。

sentences.english: Over the years the toothpick evolved into a chewstick, which was the size of a pencil.
sentences.chinese: 經過多年，牙籤演變爲一個鉛筆大小的咀嚼棒。

definition: it can clearly be seen (that this is the case)/it is (thus) clear/clear/visible
to differentiate/to draw a distinction/to divide into categories
to construct/to form/to make up/to compose/literary composition/paper mulberry (Broussonetia papyrifera)
to appear/to emerge/to present (a certain appearance)/to demonstrate
